foreignData.name: Klingenhistoriker
foreignData.text: Angreifende Kreaturen, die du kontrollierst, haben Doppelschlag.

foreignData.name: Historiador de espadas
foreignData.text: Las criaturas atacantes que controlas tienen la habilidad de dañar dos veces.

foreignData.name: Historien des lames
foreignData.text: Les créatures attaquantes que vous contrôlez ont la double initiative.

foreignData.name: Storico della Lama
foreignData.text: Le creature attaccanti che controlli hanno doppio attacco.

foreignData.name: 刃の歴史家
foreignData.text: あなたがコントロールしているすべての攻撃クリーチャーは二段攻撃を持つ。
foreignData.type: クリーチャー — 人間・クレリック

name: Blade Historian
originalText: Attacking creatures you control have double strike.

rulings.text: If Blade Historian leaves the battlefield after first-strike combat damage has been dealt but before regular combat damage (perhaps because it attacked and was destroyed by first-strike combat damage), attacking creatures you control will lose double strike. A creature without double strike won’t deal regular combat damage if it already dealt first-strike damage that turn.

text: Attacking creatures you control have double strike.
